body: While all elves are naturally lithe and agile, some also are naturally speedy and have a strong desire to rush into situations rather than worrying about looking ahead. Elves with this racial trait receive Run as a bonus feat and a +2 racial bonus on initiative checks. This racial trait replaces keen senses and weapon familiarity.
name: Fleet-Footed
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Elves/Alternate Racial Rules/Alternate Racial Traits/Fleet-Footed
